page.title: 15Oil Seed Rape
page.content:
In the early summer the fields are bright yellow and this is the sign Oil Seed Rape is growing.In our area there are many fields of Oil Seed Rape.
The seeds contain 35% to 40% of oil, which is used as cooking oil. Within the European Economic Comunity at the present time demand exceeds supply, so the price is attractive to farmers.
When some of the pods have ripened the crop is cut down. This stops the ripe pods from bursting open and spilling out the oil seeds. Then the combine harvester comes along and threshes all the seeds from the pods.
